name: Robert A. CROSBY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Crosby v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Robert A. CROSBY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.
